price: هنگامی ‌که آب طغیان کرد، ما [اجداد] شما را [به همراه نوح] در کشتی سوار کردیم،
arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā lammā ṭaghā al-māu ḥamalnākum fī al-jāriyati
